long_description: The nicely detailed Deuter AC Lite 22 Pack features padded shoulder straps and hipbelt, light materials and an Aircomfort mesh back panel for ventilated comfort on hot day hikes. Advanced Aircomfort system features contoured, softly padded shoulder straps. Hydration system compatible (reservoir sold separately). The Deuter AC Lite 22 Pack features an integrated, detachable rain cover, zippered valuables pocket and hiking pole loops.
short_description: The nicely detailed Deuter AC Lite 22 Pack features padded shoulder straps and hipbelt, light materials and an Aircomfort mesh back panel for ventilated comfort on hot day hikes.
